00013 const ConstMap<std::string,int> GrabCutType = ConstMap<std::string,int>
00014     ("Rect",cv::GC_INIT_WITH_RECT)
00015     ("Mask",cv::GC_INIT_WITH_MASK)
00016     ("Eval",cv::GC_EVAL);
00017 
00027 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00028                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00029 {
00030     // Argument vector
00031     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00032     
00033     // Check the input format
00034     if (nrhs<2 || (nrhs%2)!=0 || nlhs>3)
00035         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");    
00036     if (rhs[0].classID()!=mxUINT8_CLASS)
00037         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Only UINT8 type is supported");
00038     if (rhs[0].ndims()!=3)
00039         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Only RGB format is supported");
00040     
00041     // Option processing
00042     Mat bgdModel, fgdModel;
00043     int iterCount = 10;
00044     int mode = (rhs[1].isDouble() && rhs[1].numel()==4) ?
00045                 GC_INIT_WITH_RECT : GC_INIT_WITH_MASK; // Automatic determination
00046     if (nrhs>2) {
00047         for (int i=2; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00048             string key = rhs[i].toString();
00049             if (key=="BgdModel")
00050                 bgdModel = rhs[i+1].toMat();
00051             else if (key=="FgdModel")
00052                 fgdModel = rhs[i+1].toMat();
00053             else if (key=="Init")
00054                 mode = GrabCutType[rhs[i+1].toString()];
00055             else if (key=="MaxIter")
00056                 iterCount = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00057             else
00058                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00059         }
00060     }
00061     
00062     // Initialize mask and rect
00063     Mat mask;
00064     Rect rect;
00065     if (mode == GC_INIT_WITH_MASK)
00066         mask = rhs[1].toMat(CV_8U);
00067     else
00068         rect = rhs[1].toRect();
00069     
00070     // Apply grabCut
00071     Mat img(rhs[0].toMat());
00072     grabCut(img, mask, rect, bgdModel, fgdModel, iterCount, mode);
00073     
00074     // Convert cv::Mat to mxArray
00075     plhs[0] = MxArray(mask);
00076     if (nlhs > 1)
00077         plhs[1] = MxArray(bgdModel);
00078     if (nlhs > 2)
00079         plhs[2] = MxArray(fgdModel);
00080 }
